summary_detail.value: FIRE UPDATE Stone Lake Fire  August 31, 2017 10:00 a.m. Contact: Wisdom Ranger District (406) 689-3243 M-F 8:00 – 4:30 What: Wildland Fire Detected: August 27, 2017, 2:00 p.m. Cause: Lightning Current Size: Approximately 8 acres Containment: 70% Resources on Fire: 5 Smokejumpers and local 6 Wisdom/Wise River firefighters  Location: N 45˚41.865 W 113˚16.230   Approximately 15 miles SW of Wise River, MT   The Stone Lake fire was detected at aproximately 2:00 p.m. on Sunday, August 27, 2017. This fire  Is located high on the ridge in Whitebark Pine with rock screes nearby. Today firefighters will continue to mop up, scout and extinguish all spots outside of the main fire perimeter. Water bucket drops will be  available if needed and visibility allows for arial support.    Elbow Lake and Elbow Lake #2 Fires   What: Wildland Fire Detected: August 29, 2017, 9:00 p.m. Cause: Lightning Current Size: Approximately 1 acre Containment: 40% Resources on Fire: 5 Wisdom/Wise River...

title: August 31, 2017 update (Elbow Lake and Elbow Lake #2 Fires Wildfire)
